dict.acceptation: 允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望；
许诺；希望，指望；允诺的东西；

sent.orig: A promise is a promise.(made a promise and keep a promise).
sent.trans: 信守承诺。阿甘信守了承诺，最后也得到了最好的回报。

sent.orig: Miguel: I promise. And I promise you a nice present for Christmas, too.
sent.trans: 米盖尔：我答应你。我还要送给你一个漂亮的圣诞节礼物呢。

sent.orig: Never make promise to anyone and never trust the promise that anyone makes to you.
sent.trans: 不针对任何人任何事做出任何承诺，并永不相信任何人对你所做出的承诺。

sent.orig: This time, she promise the promise, can't again abdication second time.
sent.trans: 这次，她许下诺言，不会再放弃第二次。

sent.orig: Almasy: "I promise, I'll back for you. I promise, I'll never leave you. "
sent.trans: 埃尔麦西：“我答应你，我一定回来找你，我包管，我将永不脱离你。”
